./apps: Top-level directory containing end-user applications built from the design system, such as the docs site and playground.
./apps/docs: Docusaurus site containing design system documentation. Organised into foundations, tokens, components, patterns, development, and governance.
./apps/docs/docs: Markdown files grouped by category for the documentation site.
./apps/docs/src: Custom React components and pages used by the Docusaurus site.
./apps/docs/docs/development: Development guides for contributors, including theming/token hardening and workflow expectations.
./apps/playground: A Vite/React application used as a sandbox to develop and test components in real scenarios.
./packages: Contains the library packages that make up the design system (tokens, components, icons, utils). Each package is versioned and published separately.
./packages/tokens: Style Dictionary definitions for design tokens (colour, spacing, typography, motion, breakpoints, etc.), scripts to build them, and generated outputs.
./packages/components: Core React component library built with TypeScript and Vanilla Extract. Contains primitives, core components, themes and helper functions.
./packages/icons: A collection of reusable SVG icons exported as React components.
./packages/utils: Shared utility functions (e.g. class name combiners, number/date formatters, ID generators).
./storybook: Configuration for Storybook, used to develop and preview components in isolation.
./.github: GitHub workflows and issue templates governing CI, releases and component proposals.
./.changeset: Changeset configuration and changelog entries used by semantic-release.
./AGENTS.md: Manual for AI agents describing mission, tech stack, coding style and contribution workflow.
./.cursorrules: Enforced rules for agentic AI contributors (Always/Never list).
./.cursorignore: Specifies patterns of files/directories to ignore when building context for AI agents (e.g. build artefacts, lockfiles).
